name: I’m Going to Destroy this Country
author: SAN.G &#40산지직송&#41
content: Annihilate this land. Cleanse it of all impurities.“To think I reincarnated as a bald skeleton who can’t even poo.” The Skeleton king, the most wicked demonic king who the gods find bothersome. I was sealed after being scammed by the gods with a contract promising to turn me into a human. This is what they said. “Saint, have you awakened?” This warmth and soft texture… A human body? And I’m a saint? “Oh my, why is the baby saint in such a good mood today?” “Saint, this is the toy of that loathso
